scripts.convert-binary-semaphore: npx tsx ./scripts/binaryToTypescript.ts src/circom/semaphore/semaphore_js/semaphore.wasm src/circom/semaphore/semaphore.wasm.ts semaphoreCode && npx tsx ./scripts/binaryToTypescript.ts src/circom/semaphore/semaphore.zkey src/circom/semaphore/semaphore.zkey.ts semaphoreZKey
scripts.convert-binary-commitment: npx tsx ./scripts/binaryToTypescript.ts src/circom/commitment/commitment_js/commitment.wasm src/circom/commitment/commitment.wasm.ts commitmentCode && npx tsx ./scripts/binaryToTypescript.ts src/circom/commitment/commitment.zkey src/circom/commitment/commitment.zkey.ts commitmentZKey
scripts.create-zkey-semaphore: npx snarkjs groth16 setup src/circom/semaphore/semaphore.r1cs src/circom/pot14_final.ptau src/circom/semaphore/semaphore.zkey
scripts.create-zkey-commitment: npx snarkjs groth16 setup src/circom/commitment/commitment.r1cs src/circom/pot14_final.ptau src/circom/commitment/commitment.zkey
scripts.create-verification-key-semaphore: npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey src/circom/semaphore/semaphore.zkey src/circom/semaphore/semaphore.verificationkey.json
scripts.create-verification-key-commitment: npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey src/circom/commitment/commitment.zkey src/circom/commitment/commitment.verificationkey.json
